Crystal Shield

shield (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 153
armor id [armor]: 73 (Crystal Shield)
protection, shield [protshield]: 30
defence [def]: -4
parry [parry]: 7
encumbrance [enc]: 4
start battle spell [startbattlespell]: #739 Power of the Spheres
restriction [cannotwear]: cannot be worn by mounted units

Requires 15S10E to forge (S3E2)

This heavy crystal shield will empower a mage in battle, increasing his power in all magic Paths. Tower shields cannot be used by mounted troops.
